goal.ch: 介紹傳統的成本會計的成本計算、帳務處理、成本分析；同時，亦介紹成本會計現行管理新課題、有助未來修習管理會計課程。
goal.en: This course introduces both the concept of traditional cost accounting and new trends. This course will be helpful for learning advance management accounting.
